pullRequest.title: Add profile agent reporting to MasterBench

nodes.bodyText: Does this mean the actual throughput will not be in the json output itself? I think the throughput value should be in the json.
for these getters and setters which are part of mStatistics, do we need them anymore?
Should there be getters and setters for these, for json ser/de?
I think this parsing should be pulled out into a library, since I think it will be reused in the future.
